verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: revisited] [ARG1: his angry crusade against special counsel Robert Mueller 's " rigged investigation " on Sunday] , [ARGM-ADV: blasting Democrats for failing to] [ARGM-PRD: investigate the 2016 campaign of Hillary Clinton . " Why did n’t the 13 Angry Democrats investigate the campaign of Crooked Hillary Clinton] ? "

President Trump revisited his angry crusade against special counsel Robert Mueller 's " [V: rigged] [ARG1: investigation] " on Sunday , blasting Democrats for failing to investigate the 2016 campaign of Hillary Clinton . " Why did n’t the 13 Angry Democrats investigate the campaign of Crooked Hillary Clinton ? "

[ARG0: President Trump] revisited his angry crusade against special counsel Robert Mueller 's " rigged investigation " on Sunday , [V: blasting] [ARG1: Democrats] [ARG2: for failing to investigate the 2016 campaign of Hillary Clinton] .
